description:
HTML is mark-up language used with all websites and web based applications in the world. It is responsible for the structure of all website, HTML markup language is used in millions of web sites and applications.

In this course you will learn how create a simple one page website and gain useful skills

Learn to create a basic one page website with images, audio and video

You will learn how to view the html from any website

You will learn how to write clean, easy to read and understand

Html code.

You will learn how to create list items and much more

Learn to code with HTML and create a basic website with images, video and audio
title: HTML Made Simple For Beginners: Create a One Page Website
